about_the_game: Latvia Rallycross. Recreate the electric atmosphere of the Latvia FIA World RX Championship weekend on the 1.3km track at Bikernieki National Sports Base. The 60% asphalt, high grip, track is located on the outskirts of the Latvian capital Rīga. With very few run off areas, and one of the most technical sections in the championship, Latvia will test your multi-car track racing skills to the limit. Latvia Rallycross will be accessible through My Team, FIA World Rallycross Championship, Custom, and Time Trial.
detailed_description: Latvia Rallycross. Recreate the electric atmosphere of the Latvia FIA World RX Championship weekend on the 1.3km track at Bikernieki National Sports Base. The 60% asphalt, high grip, track is located on the outskirts of the Latvian capital Rīga. With very few run off areas, and one of the most technical sections in the championship, Latvia will test your multi-car track racing skills to the limit. Latvia Rallycross will be accessible through My Team, FIA World Rallycross Championship, Custom, and Time Trial.
